short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to add a back to top button to any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to add a back to top button to any webpage.

It remembers the position where you scrolled up from and lets you go back to it.

To configure the extension, click on the extension icon in the extension menu and configure it in the popup.
